An improved version of [[Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists]], used by [[Hinata]] after she [[Chakra Transfer Technique|obtained]] the [[chakra]] of [[Hamura Ōtsutsuki]]. This technique is increased in both strength and potential from its predecessor and, unlike the parent technique, the chakra of this technique is purple-coloured.
